Table of Contents

Name

ccdrt - apply some radiative transfer in a cube to create a map

Synopsis

ccdrt [parameter=value]

Description

The current version integrates (with no RT applied) along Z. It can optionally take the peak value instead of the (default) summed value. This is identical of what ccdmom(1NEMO) currently does, but this version will have an option to apply radiative transfer assigning absorbtion and emission to the cube (or different cubes)

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input intensity image file [???]
out=
Output image file [???]
peak=
Use peak value [f]

See Also

ccdmom(1NEMO) , snapgrid(1NEMO)

Author

Peter Teuben

Update History


03-Jul-2012    V0.1 Created    PJT
